Uses of Class
org.bitcoinj.protocols.payments.PaymentProtocol.PkiVerificationData

  • Packages that use PaymentProtocol.PkiVerificationData 
    Package Description
    org.bitcoinj.protocols.payments
    The BIP70 payment protocol wraps Bitcoin transactions and adds various useful features like memos, refund addresses and authentication.

    • Uses of PaymentProtocol.PkiVerificationData in org.bitcoinj.protocols.payments

      Fields in org.bitcoinj.protocols.payments declared as PaymentProtocol.PkiVerificationData 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      PaymentProtocol.PkiVerificationData PaymentSession.pkiVerificationData
      Stores the calculated PKI verification data, or null if none is available.
      Methods in org.bitcoinj.protocols.payments that return PaymentProtocol.PkiVerificationData 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static PaymentProtocol.PkiVerificationData PaymentProtocol.verifyPaymentRequestPki(Protos.PaymentRequest paymentRequest, KeyStore trustStore)
      Uses the provided PKI method to find the corresponding public key and verify the provided signature.
      PaymentProtocol.PkiVerificationData PaymentSession.verifyPki()
      Returns the value of pkiVerificationData or null if it wasn't verified at construction time.
